name: GO GET JOHNNY!
description:
It is the year 2039, the year of the  Z-WARS. I have decided to join the troops against the Undead. Unfortunately  I had to leave my little brother with my aunt in Haven.

A year later I got the message that my aunts's neighbourhood was over run with the Undead. Nothing is going to stop me from going back and finding Johnny.

HOW TO PLAY?

MOVEMENT - WASD

JUMP - SPACE

AIM - F

SHOOT - LEFT MOUSE

RELOAD - R

INFO TABLET - I

PAUSE MENU - P

CREDITS:

Thank you to Synty Studio for their amazing 3D- and VFX assets.

Thank you to Dark Fantasy Studio for their beautiful music.

TO THE PLAYER...

Hope you enjoy the game!

CREATED FOR THE SECRET SANTA JAM 2020
